intent_atoms.description: As a user of ISOInspector UI, I want metadata display patterns to use FoundationUI DS.KeyValueRow via BoxMetadataRow so that the UI is consistent, accessible, and testable.
All metadata displays in ParseTreeDetailView, EncryptionSubsection, and other views must be refactored to use BoxMetadataRow with correct layout, copyable behavior, and design system tokens.
BoxMetadataRow component must expose label, value, layout, and copyable properties as defined, support horizontal/vertical layouts, and provide copy-to-clipboard functionality when enabled.

Component must pass 60+ unit tests covering initialization, layout, copyable, content variations, real‑world metadata, agent describable conformance, integration, accessibility, dark mode, design system tokens, snapshot, and performance.
Accessibility compliance: WCAG 2.1 AA, VoiceOver labels, dynamic type support, minimum touch target size, reduce motion, high contrast, and copyable hints.
Dark mode support: correct color adaptation for light/dark schemes, button visibility, layout preservation.
Design system integration: use DS.Typography, DS.Spacing, DS.Color tokens consistently across the component and previews.
BoxMetadataRow must be a single entity per file and file size <400 lines.
Wrap FoundationUI DS.KeyValueRow in a new SwiftUI view (BoxMetadataRow) to provide ISOInspector‑specific API, layout options, and copyable action instead of custom Grid/GridRow implementations.
Use TDD with 60+ tests, XP incremental refactoring, PDD puzzle‑driven approach, and single-entity file structure for maintainability.

functional_units.name: BoxMetadataRow Component
functional_units.description: A SwiftUI view that wraps FoundationUI's DS.KeyValueRow to display metadata key-value pairs with optional copy-to-clipboard functionality and support for horizontal or vertical layout.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeDetailView Metadata Refactor
functional_units.description: Updates to ParseTreeDetailView that replace custom Grid/GridRow patterns with BoxMetadataRow components for displaying ISO box metadata, status rows, and encryption subsections.

functional_units.name: ComponentTestApp Showcase Screen
functional_units.description: An interactive screen in ComponentTestApp demonstrating the BoxMetadataRow component with various layouts, copyable options, dark mode, accessibility features, and real‑world ISO metadata examples.

functional_units.name: Navigation Integration for BoxMetadataRow
functional_units.description: Adds a new destination case to the ComponentTestApp navigation enum and links it from the Components section, enabling users to navigate to the showcase screen.

functional_units.name: BoxMetadataRow Test Suite
functional_units.description: A comprehensive XCTest suite covering initialization, layout, copyable behavior, content variations, real‑world metadata scenarios, agent describability, integration, accessibility, dark mode, design system tokens, snapshot/layout consistency, and performance of the BoxMetadataRow component.
